en:
A female figure standing near profile to the right, emerging above the
      handle (shown from the mid-calf up), with her weight on her straight, right leg, and her left
      foot on a rock, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold, a sphendone, white dot earrings,
      a white beaded necklace, and two white bands on each wrist, rests her right hand on her hip,
      and reaches her left hand behind a female figure seated 3/4-view to the right, with her head
      profile to the left, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold, a red/white wreath, a white
      beaded necklace, and two white bands on each wrist, places her right hand on the knee of the
      first female figure, and holds her left hand, palm out; below, a female figure seated 3/4-view
      to the left, with her head profile to the right, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold,
      and a broad red taenia over a rayed, white wreath, rests her right hand on her right knee, and
      her left hand on a rock; an olive branch above; Kadmos, standing profile to the right, with
      his weight on his left leg, and his head tilted up, wearing a chlamys clasped over his right
      shoulder, a petasos, and a white taenia, crowned by Athena (?) with a wreath, holds both arms
      at waist level, his right palm turned up, and holding in his left hand two upright spears; at
      the bottom of the spears is a bronze hydria; Athena, standing 3/4-view to the left, with his
      weight on his right leg, her left leg relaxed, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold, a
      checkerboard aegis, a red Corinthian helmet, white bead earrings, a white beaded necklace, and
      a white band on her left wrist, reaches her bent right arm (at waist level) to Kadmos, and
      lowers her left hand at her side, holding her spear at a slight diagonal over her left
      shoulder; she is crowned by a white Nike (with red wings) in the field to her right), flying
      profile to the right, with her knees bent, wearing a yellow and white striped chiton, a high
      pony tail, reaches both arms to the right (with her right hand above her left), and holds a
      beaded chain to Athena; Harmonia seated 3/4-view to the right, with her head profile to the
      left, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold, a stephane, a white beaded necklace, white
      bead earrings, and two white bands on each wrist, rests her left hand on her knee, and her
      right hand on her hip; a spotted snake crawls up from behind and is entwined around her left
      arm; a female figure, perhaps Themis, standing 3/4-view to the left, with her weight on both
      legs, and her head tilted up, wearing a belted, sleeveless chiton with straps across her
      chest, and a high pony tail, leans on Harmonia, rests her right hand on her knee, and her left
      hand on her hip; a loutrophoros behind her; above, a female figure, seated 3/4-view to the
      right, with her head profile to the left, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold, a
      white bead necklace, white bead earrings, a double red taenia, a white/red wreath, two white
      bands on her right wrist, rests her right hand on a rock, and holds her drapery in her left
      hand, over her shoulder; Hermes, standing 3/4-view to the left, wearing a chlamys draped over
      his left shoulder, fastened over his right shoulder, a petasos on his neck, a white taenia
      over a red wreath, and calf-length, strap boots, with his weight on his right leg, and his
      left leg relaxed, reaches his right hand, lowered at his side, slightly to the left, and holds
      a kerykeion in his left hand.
Harmonia and Kadmos at the fountain
